summary: Five men plot to steal a large sum of money from the local yakuza, but everything does not go as planned and the men find themselves hunted down by contract killers.
cast: Kôichi Satô|Masahiro Motoki|Jinpachi Nezu|Kippei Shîna|Naoto Takenaka|Takeshi Kitano|Kazuya Kimura|Daisuke Iijima|Yôzaburô Itô|Ryô Iwamatsu|Maiko Kawakami|Chiaki Kuriyama|Hideo Murota|Eiko Nagashima|Toshiyuki Nagashima|Kanji Tsuda|Shingo Tsurumi|Megumi Yokoyama
title: Gonin
